channel.title: Spore on John Cosio
channel.description: Recent content in Spore on John Cosio

item.title: Spore.. SporeCraft… What?
item.description: Ever played Spore, StarCraft and Warcraft strategy games? Spore lets you create vehicles, creatures and buildings and more. It was really a good game and I enjoyed busting planets and evolving creatures and mixing body parts and whatever. I’ve stumbled upon some of my creations when I played it before. Doing some art in-game. Check it out. My spore version of the Hydralisk. It kinda looks like a cuter imitation. Hahaha
